settings.heading: Fiancing with Affirm
settings.description: Beautiful bespoke jewelry at an affordable price with great financing options

settings.title: Add to Cart
settings.text: Browse jewelry and add to your shopping cart.

settings.title: Secure Checkout
settings.text: At checkout, select Affirm as your payment option.

settings.title: Order Complete
settings.text: If approved, place your order through Affirm to complete your purchase

settings.code:
Non-Promotional Financing Available

Purchases subject to credit approval and the standard terms of your Affirm Account.

No Interest if paid in full within 12 Months*

On purchases of $199 or more (after discounts) with your With Clarity account. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the promotional purchase is not paid in full within 12 months. Minimum monthly payments required.

settings.title: Frequently asked question
settings.text: Use this text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for your customers.

settings.title: Frequently asked question
settings.text: Use this text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for your customers.

settings.code:
*Qualifying purchase amount must be on one receipt. Discounts may result in the qualifying purchase amount not being satisfied. No interest will be charged on the promo balance if you pay it off, in full, within the promo period. If you do not, interest will be charged on the promo balance from the purchase date. The required minimum monthly payments may or may not pay off the promo balance before the end of the promo period, depending on purchase amount, promo length and payment allocation. Regular account terms apply to non-promo purchases and, after promo period ends, to the promo balance. For New Accounts: Purchase APR is 29.99%. Minimum interest charge is $2. Existing cardholders: See your credit card agreement terms. Subject to credit approval.
